type: HVAC Maintenance Services for the Embassy of Canada to Argentina
department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development
short_summary: The present contract award is for the provision of HVAC maintenance services for the Embassy, the Official Residence and Staff Quarters in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development, also known as the Department of Global Affairs Canada, is responsible for Canada’s Buildings and their Maintenance, including the maintenance of the HVAC systems for the Embassy of Canada, the Official Residence and Embassy Staff Quarters, in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
full_summary:
### HVAC Maintenance Services for the Canadian Embassy in Buenos Aires
----------------------------

**Reference Number:** cb-194-54648044
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** 24-249796
**Publication Date:** 2024-05-01
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-27T14:00:00 (Expired)
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

The Department of Global Affairs Canada (GAC) is seeking a contractor to provide maintenance services for the Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) systems at the Canadian Embassy, Official Residence, and Staff Quarters in Buenos Aires, Argentina. The successful contractor will be responsible for performing preventive and corrective work on the HVAC systems, ensuring optimal performance and maintaining a comfortable working environment for embassy staff.

**Key Details:**

* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and others (list provided in the tender notice)
* Regions of Opportunity: World
* Regions of Delivery: Argentina

The tender process has concluded, and the tender status is expired. However, the tender notice provides valuable information for potential contractors interested in similar opportunities.

### Technical Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

* The contractor must have experience in providing HVAC maintenance services for similar installations.
* A Spanish version of the RFP is included in the list of attachments.

### How to Respond

Please contact Meagan Leclair at [realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca](mailto:realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca) or (343) 598-9721 for further information.

### Attachments

A detailed list of attachments is provided below:

* English versions: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37288/24-249796---rfp-sp_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37288/24-249796---rfp-sp_1.pdf)
* Spanish versions: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37288/24-249796---rfp-fr_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/
